data.title: Eat and help the community
data.text: We found this place using Trip Advisor and are glad we did.  The pizza tasted good and the atmosphere was fun.  The pizzas are individual sized and you create your own.  The part we liked most is that they use part of the proceeds to help local charities.

data.title: All Around Great!
data.text:
I love this place!
What's great about it?
-The food! From the pizza to the dessert to the local brews they have, it's delicious! Plus, it's reasonably priced and their individual size pizzas allow everyone to get what they want!
-The atmosphere that it offers through in and outdoor seating, a fun close knit dining area, local art for sale, quirky math decor, and a train that runs on a track up above your head. 
-The people that genuinely seem to enjoy their job and the owner who is intimately involved in the business. 
-The location which is conveniently located right off 36. 
-The involvement in the community. They helped support a local century bike ride I participated in and I know they give 50% of their tips to a scholarship fund. 

Complaints:
-Literally, I don't have any. I see that other reviewers commented about the cleanliness, but I didn't see it as a problem. 

I definitely recommend this place! It brings together all the elements of a great business!

data.title: Ms
data.text: We eat at I  Pie at least once a month. Consistently good food, pizza is made fresh to order (we can see the kitchen and cooks), owner lives in our community and supports local school fundraising. He also hires local kids to work there. They have a food truck which serves the local breweries - pizza is the same high quality. Prices are reasonable. Highly recommend.

data.title: Exellent Pizza
data.text: We love this place.  The pizza is great and there are tons of options.  The pizzas are personal size so everybody gets to enjoy what kind of toppings they like.

data.title: Great to if you like thin crust
data.text:
I like their thin crust pizza. Lots of topping and good price. 
People are friendly and helpful. 
Little dusty, could use a good cleaning.

data.title: New neighborhood place
data.text: This is not my kind of pizza. It's the fast food type that rolls thru an oven for a few minutes.  I prefer the real hot oven baked pizza.

data.title: Great pizza and service
data.text: Some of the best pizza we've ever had!  Personal size pizzas that allow everyone to get what they want. Good selection of beer to pair with your pizza.

data.title: Best Fresh Pizza
data.text: Unique pizzas with fresh ingredients!  Everyone is really friendly and your order is filled within 10-15 minutes. Good salads and wings, too.

data.title: Good quick supper
data.text: Our daughter stopped here to pick up supper for us. The pies were excellent and a great value for the price. The ingredients were fresh and tasty and it made for a nice picnic lunch by the pool.

data.title: Great pizza and no arguments about toppings
data.text: Great concept with individual pizzas the only option, everyone is happy!  Far better pie than you would expect very close to NY style.  Need a slice? Go here you will not regret it, fair price, yummy pie!

data.title: Really good pizza
data.text:
Took the family to Infinitus Pie in Broomfield during our trip to Denver. I was really surprised that their pizza was this good. I have eaten pizza all over the country and I'm pretty picky, but this place is good.
The first surprise was the fact that they only make one size pizza. The second surprise was how inexpensive it was. There were seven of us. Everyone had the pizza they wanted with soft drinks and a couple of local craft beers the total was right at $80. 
If you're in the Broomfield area I recommend you give this place a try.

data.title: Their Wheat Ridge location is great
data.text: This is a pizza restaurant/take out in which the staff really wants you to enjoy the food they make.  And they truly make great pizza.  What makes Infinitus Pie unique is that they are all individual pizzas made just how you want it with loads of options from ingredients to crust.  Each pizza is enough for one person and it's fun to come up with your own combination.  We recently had a number of people over and we gave each of them an Infinitus menu, we called in the order, picked the pizzas up and everyone was happy.  No one was picking off what they didn't like or complaining about what kind of crust they liked.  Everyone had what they wanted.  A great place, great staff, great food and great concept. Happy they are in Wheat Ridge.

data.title: "Go to" pizza place
data.text: Great family place to get your own pizza made the way you like it!  Good crust, yummy toppings, and affordable too.  I like that you can order online and even save your favorite orders. The dine in atmosphere is not the best, although they do have local beer on tap and a simple outdoor patio.  We usually take it to go.

data.title: Individual sized pizzas are a big hit!
data.text: We like iPie because everyone gets exactly what they want with no hassle. Prices are good too! I've always been happy with my pizzas-- they use good quality ingredients that taste good. The restaurant atmosphere isn't much but the people are friendly and service is fast.

data.title: Good pizza, quaint atmosphere
data.text: Walk up to the counter, order your pizza, go sit and wait while smelling everyone else's pizza. Standard diner tables with more tables on the patio. They have a model train running around on the interior wall, giving it a quaint feel. I had the "Train Wreck" which is some of A LOT of toppings. We were in a group and they treated us right.

data.title: personalize a great pizza
data.text: It is so fun to make your own pizza here. The toppings range from traditional to unique get as crazy as you like. They even have weekly suggestions. Even gluten free options. The kids will love it. Not only is the food great but the owners grew up in Broomfield and support the community. Always our number one place for Pizza!

data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: I love the Pizza here.  The employees are friendly.  It's a great neighborhood pizza place.  They choices are excellent.  The only thing lacking in my opinion is the setting.  It's a bit worn, but possibly thats because they are so busy focusing on great pizza.

data.title: Great unique pizzas
data.text: Locally owned pizza shop that is very involved in the community, so it feels good to support them.  But their pizzas are awesome.  They only do individual size pizzas, but have an amazing variety of your normal (and less normal) sauces and toppings.  Staff is always very friendly.  They can get busy so you might have to wait, but it is worth the wait.  My 15 year old will bike the 3 miles there to spend his own money on a pizza lunch.

data.title: Good time with the family! Love the personal pizzas! The employees were amazing and accommodating
data.text: Great personal pizza's! Great selection, decent prices. Our family enjoyed everything about it. Employees are excellent!!!  They allowed us to have a little b day party for our boy!!!

data.title: Nice
data.text: You can have different kind of pizza from their list or do yourself as you want. Really nice and affordable.
